name: com.immutable.passport
description:
The Immutable SDK for Unity helps you integrate your game with Immutable Passport.

For a complete working example, please visit https://github.com/immutable/unity-immutable-sdk/tree/main/sample.

samples.description: Drag-and-drop prefab for easy Passport integration with example scripts and documentation.
Complete sample scenes and scripts demonstrating Passport SDK features.
